entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: Assertion failed '(newLayoutCost < currLayoutCost) || Compiler::fgProfileWeightsEqual(newLayoutCost, currLayoutCost, 0.001)' during 'Optimize layout' #109984
    10.0.0
  • Neighboring bounds checks aren't collapsed #109983
    Future
  • STATUS_ACCESS_VIOLATION in coreclr.dll version 9.0.24.52809 #109981
  • [STJ] PooledBufferWriter unnecessarily clears its buffers on every flush operation. #109979
  • .NET 9 mono debugger much slower #109980
  • [Network] Provide an API to set the max buffer size to be used in a HttpMessageHandler. #109991
  • Inconsistent Hostfxr Installation Location #109974
  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed 'isContainable || supportsRegOptional' during 'Generate code' #109973
    10.0.0
  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed '!m_compiler->lvaInSsa(tree->GetLclNum())' during 'Assertion prop' #109971
    10.0.0
  • Hitting assert in NibbleMapDeleteUnlocked #109970
  • AOT compile aot-instances.dll, the AOT compiler exited with code 139. #109966
  • JIT: branch is not removed after a bounds check #109962
    Future
  • Community notifications #109961
  • PerformanceCounter.NextValue() always return 0 for "HTTP Service Request Queues" MaxQueueItemAge #109956
  • [browser] contribute dotnet perf benchmark into JetStream suite #109953
    10.0.0
  • LdapSessionOptions.VerifyServerCertificate Callback Does Not Work in Linux #109952
  • Unable to use ICustomTypeDescriptor in C++/CLI #109950
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: Multiple (13) Regressions on 11/14/2024 12:52:44 AM #109967
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: Regression in System.Reflection.Attributes #109969
  • Wasm test failure: System.IO.FileNotFoundException : Could not load file or assembly 'xunit.assert #109945
  • HybridGlobalization problem in Blazor WASM targeting .NET 8 and published with .NET 9 SDK #109951
  • Test failure: System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_GetCounters #109942
  • cmov not being used in nested hand-unrolled loop #109940

Closed

  • LibraryImport was working properly with NET8 but not anymore with NET9 #109946
  • Investigate and fix issues for ARM64 Managed Debugging on Windows #12864
  • Debug - Wire Debug Protocol support #35831
  • [8.0] Migrate off of Fedora 39 container image #109822
  • Custom JsonConverter breaks context variable in JsonSchemaExporterOptions.TransformSchemaNode callback #109868
  • SSE/AVX byte multiplication could be improved #109775
  • Timeout in runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.cmd #106890
    10.0.0
  • Async support for IEnlistmentNotification #46316
  • CLR_GCHEAPCOLLECT_KEYWORD triggers a GC twice #99487
    10.0.0
  • There is no non-Obsolete way to read an Authenticode signer certificate in .NET 9 #109941
  • Improve code coverage for System.Xml namespace types #20428
    Future
  • .Net 9 - X509CertificateLoader.LoadPkcs12 - private key throws error on certificate load #109881
    Future
  • .NET 9 doesn't run Module Initializer inside System.Runtime.InteropServices #109949
  • [UnsafeAccessor] throws MissingFieldException on .NET 9 when used on unspeakable fields #109943
    10.0.0
  • randomizedallocationsampling tests are failing on nativeaot #109828
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unsupported _AggressiveAttributeTrimming switch #109994
    needs-area-label
  • SPMI: Switch back to unpinned 9.0 SDK for micro benchmarks #109992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transfer ThreadPool local queue to high-pri queue on Task blocking #109990
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/9.0-staging] Transfer ThreadPool local queue to high-pri queue on Task blocking #109989
    area-System.Threading
  • ILC: Allow OOB reference to upgrade framework assembly #109988
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Small clean up in assertionprop for relops #109987
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable transitions test under GC Stress #109986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Disable ALCTest under GC Stress #109985
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Refactor 3-opt utilities to facilitate expansion #109982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't use a GVM in Linq Select with NAOT by default #109978
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Avoid exception when parsing AD path for port number #109977
    bug, area-System.DirectoryServices, regression-from-last-release, 10.0.0
  • Allow nibblemap deletes to be no-op #109976
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix transformer handling of boolean schemas in JsonSchemaExporter. #109975
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.x
  • threads.h: Fix up grammar/spelling in vm/threads.h #109972
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Suppress IL3000 in MsQuicApi constructor #109965
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Use explicit full-path for loading MsQuic.dll on Windows #109963
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Use reaching definitions in CSE to update conservative VNs #109959
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64-SVE: Fix up comments in optimizemaskconversions #109955
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Don't log from property accessors in the ILLink task. #109948
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

Merged

  • Fix failing test on NativeAOT #109853
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • JIT: Continue profile consistency checks until after finally cloning #109792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove switch recognition fallthrough quirk #109796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Transfer ThreadPool local queue to high-pri queue on Task blocking #109841
    area-System.Threading
  • [cDAC] Set RejitFlags to use a known underlying type #109935
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove `unsafe` modifier from `Memory<T>.Span` #106085
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Use Fedora 38 helix queue instead of 39, like in main #109964
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Temporarily uninstall pkg-config@0.29.2 in install-dependencies.sh #109968
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix transformer handling of boolean schemas in JsonSchemaExporter. #109954
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix small typos in linux-build-methodology.md #109947
    area-Meta
  • [EventTrace] Update check for provider triggered GC #109587
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Remove `netcoreapp >= 7.0` condition #109701
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix output directory for cross compilers if OutputRID is overridden #109932
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix attribute spelling in resx #109929
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [WASI] throw PNSE in `ManualResetEventSlim.Wait` #109839
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, community-contribution, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [browser] disable debugger tests on CI #108178
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Remove unsafe perf quirks from System.Text.Encodings.Web #109896
    area-System.Text.Encodings.Web
  • Improved the test coverage of XmlWriter. #107680
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Move ReflectionCoreCallbacks into ReflectionAugments #109912
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add tests for [UnsafeAccessor] on fields with readonly #109944
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, community-contribution

Updated

  • Rework HttpClient content buffering #109642
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Add SseFormatter #109832
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx, 10.0.0
  • JIT: (x u>> cns) -> [0..(x's max value >> cns)] #109900
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix BCE regression #109466
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Unroll more Equals/StartsWith/EndsWith on arm64 #109036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Add left-handed spherical and cylindrical billboards #109605
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure proper cleanup of key files when not persisting them #109845
    area-System.Security
  • Fix hostfxr.h to be valid C again. #109763
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Ensure proper cleanup of key files when not persisting them #109844
    area-System.Security
  • Switch to non-incremental servicing and update ApiCompatNetCoreAppBaselineVersion to 9.0.0 #109790
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Proposed fix for issue XSLT extension methods format-date & format-time #97402
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Adding CPUID for AVX10.2 #109302
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement ProcessStartInfo.InheritHandles for Windows #107836
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Simplify usage of TestPlaceholderTarget in tests #109873
    test-enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [JIT] Add legacy extended EVEX encoding and EVEX.ND feature to x64 emitter backend #108796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Add CreateChained to RateLimiter #107230
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2585124 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Re-enable skiasharp WBT tests #109232
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] `TensorPrimitives` XML docs: `MinNumber`/`ReciprocalSqrt`/`ReciprocalSqrtEstimate` oversights #109922
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics, 9.0.x
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for MacCatalyst/iOS simulator #109928
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-maccatalyst, community-contribution
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix few RandomAccess.Write edge case bugs #109646
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 9.0.x
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Implement ReJIT portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #109936
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add a diagnostic mode for ArrayPool.Shared #109695
    area-System.Runtime
  • Move unboxing helpers to managed code #109135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Avoid generic virtual dispatch for frozen collections alternate lookup #108732
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Replace DAMT.All with more restricted annotation on InvokeMember/FindMembers/DeclaredMembers #109801
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix IDynamicInterfaceCastable with shared generic code #109918
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix obtaining type handles of IDynamicInterfaceCastableImplementation #109909
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • More WriteGather fixes #109826
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Rename module file to .mjs #105303
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi, os-browser
  • New GC decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add configuration variables. #109907
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add numerical ordering option for string comparison operations #109861
    area-System.Globalization, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Keep delegate object alive during invoke #105099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix dataflow analysis for GetNestedType #109814
    new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Unhandled exception handler. #109806
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] JIT: Use ABI names for floating registers #109728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Compile minimum wasm file size #2789

PullRequests

Created

  • Exclude src/docs from CI #2792
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Use `DebugType=none` instead of `NativeDebugSymbols=false` #2791
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [RuntimeAsync] Add support for async struct instance methods (potential implementation 1) #2790
    area-async

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Update macos version #2788
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [SwiftBindings] Binding process doc #2779
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add WasmExternalDwarf property to create an external_debug_info section #2786
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Automate `WasmDebugging.csproj` via LLDB scripting #2785
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [SwiftBindings] Document generic methods #2771
    area-SwiftBindings
  • Status and incomplete fat `Precode` pointer. #2780
    area-CoreclrInterpreter
  • Interpreter design docs #2774
    area-CoreclrInterpreter

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet format (latest 8) intermittently fails with "Unable to locate dotnet CLI. Ensure that it is on the PATH." #44957
  • .NET 9 SDK introduces hang in `dotnet format` when run on Azure Pipelines in combination with NB.GV #44951

Closed

  • .NET 9.0.100 SDK update broke our interop tests with node.js #44940
  • dotnet test hangs with .NET9 RC1/RC2 in CI build on Ubuntu #43432

PullRequests

Created

  • Run all steps in a container #44969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove unsupported _AggressiveAttributeTrimming switch #44968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Write APICompat suppressions when baseline suppressions aren't empty #44965
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44963
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-enable source- build CI legs #44959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Log the exception from 'dotnet --version' command #44958
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't download Windows SDK ref pack for C++ projects #44956
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • fix: CLI Help missing package description #44954
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • upgraded logging for #595 log url when connection is closed #44953
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • tool-install: Fix NuGet Feed test #44964
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [CP to release/9.0.2xx] Run 'AddImplicitDefineConstants' on 'BeforeCompile' #44938
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove eventlistener guard #44896
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update Windows SDK projection #44807
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44764
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44793
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Undo 10.0 sdk workarounds and re-enable source-build legs #44937
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [VMR] Enable building Mono Cross AOT verticals #44924
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #44887
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2585268 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable test timeout dump collection #44730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable tests following the net10 transition #44931
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Javiercn/replace swa globbing #44159
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Workaround for MSBuildProjectLoader.LoadProjectInfoAsync throwing on unrecognized project language #44927
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Workaround for MSbuildProjectLoader.LoadProjectInfoAsync throwing on unrecognized project language #44928
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Apply xunit configuration to all tests for better test failure diagnostics #44907
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix: Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies #40725
    untriaged
  • Enable Signing in Repos that Override Build Actions #44855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44913
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove `global::` from generated global usings #44916
    untriaged, Area-ImplicitUsings
  • WIP - Add fantomas formatting support #44801
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support publishing of multi-architecture OCI container images #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Add VMR leg that builds test projects #44843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update AddSourceToNuGetConfig task #44854
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initial attempt at removing explicit #nullable enable in source #44936
    untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Unbound generic types in `nameof` #8662
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #8659
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: String/Character escape sequence \e #8657
    13.0
  • [Proposal]: Collection expressions #8652
    12.0
  • [Proposal]: Allow new-lines in all interpolations #8649
    11.0
  • [Proposal]: Raw string literal #8647
    11.0
  • [Proposal]: Allow using alias directive to reference any kind of Type #8645
    12.0
  • [Proposal]: Simple lambda parameters with modifiers #8637
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: `field` keyword in properties #8635
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Property-Scoped Fields #8633
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Null-conditional await #8631
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: Adding Index support to existing library types (redux) #8629
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Always available extension methods #8624
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Variable declarations under disjunctive patterns #8622
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: call local static functions in base constructor #8620
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: Ignored Directives Support #8617
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Improve overload resolution for delegate compatibility #8615
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: User-defined positional patterns #8613
    Working Set

Closed

  • Champion "Const Var" #106
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Unbound generic types in `nameof` #8480
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: Collection Expressions Next (C#13 and beyond) #7913
  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: String/Character escape sequence `\e` as a short-hand for `\u001b` (`<ESCAPE>`) (VS 17.9, .NET 9) #7400
    13.0
  • [Proposal]: Prefer spans over interfaces in overload resolution #7276
    Likely Never
  • [Proposal]: Add `private` and `namespace` accessibility modifiers for top-level types. #6794
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Embedded Language Indicators for raw string literals #6247
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Collection expressions (VS 17.7, .NET 8) #5354
    12.0
  • [Proposal]: Compound assignment in object initializer and `with` expression #5176
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Remove restriction that interpolations within a non-verbatim interpolated string cannot contain new-lines. #4935
    11.0
  • [Proposal]: Raw string literal #4304
    11.0
  • Champion: using aliases for any types (VS 17.6, .NET 8) #4284
    12.0
  • Proposal: Ternary comparison operator #4108
    Any Time
  • Allow ref assignment for switch expressions #3326
    Any Time
  • Champion: Name lookup for simple name when target type known #2926
    Working Set
  • Switching ReadOnlySpan<char> with constant strings #1881
    11.0
  • Champion "Negated-condition if statement" #882
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Permit trailing commas in method signatures and invocations #391
    Backlog
  • Declaration of ref/out parameters in lambdas without typename #338
    Any Time
  • Proposal: `field` keyword in properties #140
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Property-Scoped Fields #133
    Backlog
  • Champion "Null-conditional await" #35
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: Adding Index support to existing library types (redux) #5596
    Backlog
  • Please port spec bugs to this repository #173
  • Missing section on switch expressions #3265
  • Champion: allow 'default' in deconstruction #1394
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: Always available extension methods #4029
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Permit variable declarations under disjunctive patterns #4018
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: [call local static functions in base constructor] #3980
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: Support readonly modifier for classes and records #3885
    Backlog
  • [Proposal] Ignored Directives Support #3507
    Working Set
  • [Proposal] Improve overload resolution for delegate compatibility #3277
    Any Time
  • Proposal: User-defined positional patterns #4131
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Move proposals to C# 9 folder #8625

Updated

  • Spec updates #8609

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0028 raised when initializing a collection from another collection. #75981
    17.13
  • Code cleanup removes usings from external C# files #75979
  • VB: Support unbound generic types in 'nameof' operator. #75975
  • Go to implementation broken (ctrl+f12) in VS 2022 17.12 #75974
  • "Convert to switch expression" refactoring for ternary statements #75973
  • Change constructor error message: Instead of writing "… that takes 0 arguments" omit this part if no constructor is available #75968
    Backlog
  • MSBuildWorkspace.OpenSolutionAsync hangs indefinitely on 4.9.0+ in Windows 2022 Azure CI/CD #75967

Closed

  • When generating a class from an anonymous object, implicitly-named properties are ignored #75980
    Backlog
  • Cannot create MetadataReference from WebCIL #75868
  • CS8604 FP with static partial class #75954
  • VisualStudio FileChangeWatcher doesn't correctly report changes for multiple projects #74716
    18.0
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.shadowDebug-35518.109 #75965

PullRequests

Created

  • Record "nameof(UnboundGenericType<>)" as done #75982
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Postpone respecting the code-style analysis config rule until NET10 #75978
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Simplify tests #75977
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add fixer to convert from bound generic types in nameof to unbound types. #75976
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Unskip integration tests #75970
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix TFM of MSBuild.UnitTests #75969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Tweaks to inline variable and nullable #75966
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Support unbound generic types in 'nameof' operator. #75368
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Include list of processes that lock file in `can't write file` error message #75946
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, Needs API Review, VSCode, Backlog
  • Null-conditional assignment 1 #75821
    Area-Compilers, VSCode, New Feature - Null Conditional Assignment, 17.13 P2
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enhance explicit interface implementation completion provider #75568
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations from enumerator allocations in AnalyzerExecutor.ExecuteSyntaxNodeActions #75940
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Clear hoisted locals when disposing iterator and async-iterator state machines #75908
    Area-Compilers
  • Prefer array to ReadOnlySpan over Span #75853
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types, 17.13 P2
  • VB Overload Resolution Priority - handle operators and respect language version #75941
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Update language feature status #75962
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Close stale PRs #75963
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Templates.Mvc.Tests are slow #59062
  • Perf improvement: updates #59061
  • razor class library build failed because staticwebassets.build.json was 0Bytes #59059
  • OpenApi generation creates NullableOf version of structs when null is allowed? #59056
  • Allow custom response body streaming of HTTP Responses without Transfer-Encoding or Content-Length set #59055
  • ApiVersion status value causing routing issues (error 404) #59054
  • OpenAPI: OperationId not set when EndpointName attribute is not available #59053
  • When endpoint return ValidationProblem and has errors the property errors doesn't have values. #59052
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot #59049
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #59048
  • description is missing when using with FromForm #59042
  • Blazor hybrid template with Tailwind #59040

Closed

  • User Claims missing from Identity Endpoints breaks Authorization #52142
    .NET 10 Planning
  • External Google login breaks when logging from mobile device where there are multiple google accounts #39513
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Redirect_uri not configured with NativeApp client #37905
    .NET 10 Planning
  • id_token signature validation in OpenIdConnectHandler in case of authorization code flow #37549
    .NET 10 Planning
  • IdentityConstants aren't Constants #20122
    .NET 10 Planning
  • IdentityUserToken table PK and expiration date #5762
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Target net10.0 in RepoTasks #58823
  • Parameterize TFM from `net5.0` -> to `$(TargetTfm)` #22737
  • build Asp.net core 8.0.1 some errors #59025
  • Support emitting OpenAPI documents in YAML format #58516
    10.0-preview1
  • OpenApi - Does not respect JsonStringEnumConverter #59057
  • generate openapi json error when custom IBindingSourceMetadata #59013
    10.0-preview1
  • Reported to MSRC and considered not to disclose #59050
  • Register, Log In component Issues - .NET9 #58997
  • In .net 9 blazor wasm mode, unhandled exceptions in asynchronous methods will cause the Runtime to crash #59007
  • [Regression] .NET 9 ILLinker trims out `ControllerContext` setter out of `ControllerBase` #59039
  • Perf improvement: caching, json #58991
  • Perf regression: mvc #59012
  • Perf regression: json, updates #59017
  • [main] project template tests fail #58935

PullRequests

Created

  • Harden parsing of [Range] attribute values #59043
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Fix XmlDocs for StaticAssetsEndpointRouteBuilderExtensions MapStaticAssets #58905
    community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Hot Reload agent improvements #58333
    area-blazor, 9.0.1
  • Add 9.0 SiteExtension, remove some 6.0 bits #58925
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Use new Dictionary AlternateLookup to avoid allocation in DictionaryJumpTable #58305
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Undo RepoTasks workaround #59058
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Don't run IIS websocket tests on unsupported queue #59036
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Add `-sign` to build.sh #59041
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Don't throw exception for parameters with custom binding source #59035
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix SignalR Java POM to include description #58895
    area-signalr, 10.0-preview1
  • Address variable initialization warnings in ANCM (C26494) #58904
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add package for consuming Blazor framework assets #58721
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Put package assets in TFM-specific folder #58995
    area-mvc
  • Add pre-commit hook with code formatting #58965
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Build installers at the end of the repo build #58987
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • [release/9.0] Fix IIS outofprocess to remove WebSocket compression handshake #58931
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 9.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve error message when users are referencing a .NET 9 NUGET from a .NET 8 TFM #25970
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Calling a method that returns `Task` from JS will throw #25968
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] App TitleBar overlapping on .NET9 when using Modals #25964
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • .NET Maui app crashes on startup on 17.10.5 #25963
  • App fails to inject INavigationRootManager when using PushModalAsync #25961
  • [Android] Line breaks not occurring when pressing Enter in Entry configured as multiline, even with ImeOptions set to None. #25952
  • [iOS] Animated WebP Support for iOS #25951
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Editor: Text selection glitchy on subsequent lines #25950
  • [ci] Fix signing identities missing on some bots #25948
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • iOS App crashes on iOS 18 when placing html label in carousel view with > 2 elements #25946
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] DatePicker Graphical Bug #25943
    Backlog
  • iOS hangs when choosing to Select All text on an Editor when AutoSize = TextChanges #25940
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android, IOS, Mac] Unable to Remove Thumb Image in Slider Control #25939
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Editor when entering a text which exceeds the maximum height resets the position #25938
  • [Android] When using ViewCell in a ListView, some records are not displayed. #25936
    Backlog
  • Regression from MAUI 8: Picker entries blank in release mode (Android) #25935
    .NET 9 SR1.1

Closed

  • MAUI .net7 / .net8 ios push notifications not received in DidReceiveRemoteNotification #18012
  • How to start a single UI test from the command line? #19554
  • Impossible to add UseWindowsForms in a MAUI project #14970
    Backlog
  • Some nugget for MAUI is not working for windows development, but works okay for Android. #25962
  • Upgrade assistant - SupportedOSPlatformVersion #25955
  • iOS Action sheet appearing on Editor focus #25945
  • [ci] Improve run on arm of template tests #25944
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Error to include reference to MAUI Tookit #25937
  • WinRt exception when page navigated #22790
    .NET 9 SR1.1

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.1 to 1.0.2 #25969
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Add support for async .NET methods #25967
  • [ci] Enable provisionator with variable or devdiv #25966
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure, area-testing
  • [net9.0] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #25965
    area-infrastructure, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Border.Shadow hide the collectionView Header/footer - fix #25960
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 13 #25954
    community ✨
  • [XC] fix compiled bindings containing arrays #25949
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] Fix RadioButton using ContentPresenter not rendering #25947
    t/bug, area-xaml, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-radiobutton

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Windows] Fix crash when navigating pages #25958
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [ci] Split templates #25953
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [Windows] Fix crash when navigating pages #25740
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #25956
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed CarouselView Loop="False" rendering items incorrectly - test fix #25924
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [ci] Try to call trim #25941
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241118221232126 to main #25933
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Add Syncfusion Toolkit to Dependabot config #25942
    area-templates

Updated

  • Fixed the iOS BackButton title does not update when set to an empty string or whitespace #25813
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Disable `MeasureInvalidated` propagation by default / clean-up legacy layouts / fix iOS CV items resize #25664
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.1 to 1.0.2 #25925
    area-infrastructure, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Source Generation for XAML #24865
    area-xaml
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment is off #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Update Windows SDK projection for testing #25781
    area-infrastructure, community ✨
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titleview
  • [housekeeping] Use MSBuild for provisioning Android SDK, Appium #25288
  • [Testing] UITest to measure layout passes on a common scenario #25671

  • [Android] Navigation icon blink fix - shell (#18867) #21455

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 3 #25734

  • Fix for OnAppearing of Page called again, although this page was on already replaced NavigationStack #25596

  • made FilterQuality configurable for Resizetizer #25686

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "The operands for operator 'Equal' do not match the parameters of method 'op_Equality'." while using in ?? COALESCE in Where #35150
  • Rowversion migration regression from EF Core 8 to 9 #35148
  • Object equality on object nested in JSON column #35147
  • Programmatic Scaffold-Migration Issue After Updating to 9.0.0 #35146
  • How to batch configure global filters on soft deleted entities and non-soft deleted entities #35145
  • SplitQuery order expression not equality #35144

Closed

  • "Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common (= 4.8.0)" conflicts with other packages using newer versions. #35143
  • Represent query parameters with a dedicated type instead of ParameterExpression #35089
    10.0.0
  • Generates Incorrect UPDATE Instead of INSERT SQL for New Entity in One-to-Many Relationship #35090
  • Non-deterministic user seed data in HasData() causes constant "model changed" warnings #35080
  • EF Core ValueConverter string to bool for nullable string column #35051
  • HasPendingModelChanges() always returns true #34967

PullRequests

Merged

  • Introduce QueryParameterExpression #35101
  • Fix build with latest roslyn #35149
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35138
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 9.0.0 to 9.1.0 #35141
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.45.0 to 3.45.2 #35139
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore from 8.0.10 to 9.0.0 #35140
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
